events.name: WOLFDREAM: A Salem Art Gallery Exhibition
events.description: The gallery will be open all night. Browse art, some of which is available for purchase, supporting a Salem local wolf sanctuary.

events.name: Mardi Gras, Lupercalia and Bananas Foster with The Satanic Chef
events.description: Learn how to cook the wonderful bananas foster & creme anglaise dessert which will light any Bible on fire at The Satanic Estate. Learn how Lupercalia traditions made its way into Mardi Gras from the pagan rituals of Lupercalia and saturnalia and eventually tied into the Cuisine of New Orleans.

events.name: Tom The Witch's Neighborhood: Love
events.description: Join local Salem witch, historian, and Satanic Minister Thomas O'Brien Vallor for some educational programming with special guests, field trips, and more! This episode is all about love. Brought to you by the number 666.

events.name: Abortion as a (Religious) Right with Religious Reproductive Rights Director Mari Davis
events.description: This presentation will discuss The Satanic Temple’s Abortion Ritual, what that entails and includes, frequently asked questions surrounding the ritual, navigating misinformation as well as what information to provide to those seeking abortions.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: Finding Love & Self-Acceptance Through Satanism with Shiva Honey
events.description: Shiva explores the role of love in modern Satanism and shares insights on how to cultivate self-acceptance and love within your Satanic practice. She will also discuss how rituals from her book, The Devil's Tome: A Book of Modern Satanic Ritual, have helped her on a self-love journey.

events.name: I’m The Werewolf - Lupercalia DJ Set with Shiva Honey and Grahamzig
events.description: Shiva and Grahamzig spin tunes with themes of passion, romance, and wolf’s milk to unleash the animal within.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: The Satanic Estate's Satanic Archive Library is open all night for the holidays. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
